story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Bazid Misr Travel is a licensed Egyptian tourism company, approved by the Ministry of Tourism with a Class A license (#1696), founded on September 20, 2008. The company has extensive experience in organizing domestic and international trips, especially Hajj and Umrah programs, offering complete services including visas, flights, accommodations, and full supervision by a team of specialists.
story.p2: Bazid Misr Travel is a trusted name known for professionalism and reliability across Egypt.
